title: buying rp from other pc that dont have the game
body: i try to buy rp, but i cant from my computer. i press buy rp in-game from paypal, coppying the link to the other pc and try to pay from there. when i press continue its get me to league of legends site and says session expired. there is any way to rp from other pc that dont have league and cant download league? thx!

replies.body:
No, you'll need to purchase RP on a PC that has League installed. To resolve the issue on your own PC, I recommend working through [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), which is targetted at resolving this exact problem.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through that guide.
